comment.text: The "SsoError" translation key is used to display an internal server error message, indicating a problem occurred during Single Sign-On authentication. This error is typically displayed in UI elements such as login dialogs or button captions when SSO authentication fails.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the translation 'خطأ في الخادم الداخلي' is a very literal translation of 'Internal server error'. A more natural and commonly used translation in a user-facing context would be something like 'حدث خطأ في الخادم' (An error occurred on the server).

While 'Σφάλμα εσωτερικού διακομιστή' is a literal translation, a more natural and user-friendly translation for "Internal server error" would be something like "Σφάλμα εξυπηρέτησης" or "Παρουσιάστηκε σφάλμα στον διακομιστή".  'Σφάλμα εξυπηρέτησης' is a more common and understandable phrase in this context.

The Armenian translation "Ներքին սերվերի սխալ:" is a literal translation of 'Internal server error' and while technically correct, it lacks the nuance and common phrasing used in Armenian error messages. A more natural-sounding translation would be something like "Մերսերվերի սխալ է տեղի ունեցել" or "Սերվերի ներքին սխալ:"

The translation "인터넷 서버 오류입니다." literally translates to "It is an internet server error." While conveying a similar meaning, the English "Internal server error" implies the error originates within the server's own code or configuration, rather than an issue with the internet connection itself. A more accurate translation would emphasize the server-side origin of the error.
The word 'ເຊີບເວີ' is likely a transliteration of 'server' and might be misspelled. The correct spelling is 'ເຊີບເວີ'.
The word 'ຜິດພາດ' is correct, but it’s good to confirm this is the most natural way to express 'error' in this context. It is a common and acceptable translation.

While the translation is understandable, 'ເຊີບເວີພາຍໃນຜິດພາດ' is a very literal translation. A more natural and idiomatic translation in Lao might be something like 'ຄວາມຜິດພາດຂອງເຊີບເວີ' (server error) or 'ເຊີບເວີມີປັນຫາ' (server has a problem).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເຊີບເວີມີປັນຫາ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අභ්‍යන්තර සේවාදායකයේ දෝෂයකි' while technically accurate, is a bit formal and lengthy for an error message. A more user-friendly and concise translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a simpler phrasing like 'අභ්‍යන්තර දෝෂයක්' (abhyaantara dosayak) - 'Internal error' or 'සේවාදායක දෝෂය' (sewaadaayak doshaya) - 'Server error'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Интерна грешка сервера" is a literal translation of 'Internal server error' but doesn't fully capture the intended meaning in a user-friendly context. A more appropriate translation would convey the idea of a problem occurring on the server's side.

The translation 'Interna greška servera' is a literal translation and not the most natural way to express 'Internal server error' in Serbian. A more common and natural phrasing would be 'Unutrašnja greška servera' or 'Greška na serveru'.
